# Coming soon.

This vignette is coming soon and will be live on or about January 25th, 2018. You can view the most recent version of this vignette [online](http://fabricatr.declaredesign.org/articles/other_packages.html).

In the mean time, you may be interested in any of these vignettes:

* [Generating Discrete Random Variables](http://fabricatr.declaredesign.org/articles/variable_generation.html)
* [Panel and Cross-Classified Data](http://fabricatr.declaredesign.org/articles/cross_classified.html)
* [Resampling and Bootstrapping Hierarchical Data](http://fabricatr.declaredesign.org/articles/resampling.html)
